column4: Tesla fired hundreds of employees in past week
column5: Luxury electric vehicle maker Tesla Inc  fired about 400 employees this week  including associates  team leaders and supervisors  a former employee told Reuters on Friday.

column4: UPDATE 1-Tesla fired hundreds of employees in past week
column5: Oct 13 Luxury electric vehicle maker Tesla Inc fired about 400 employees this week  including associates  team leaders and supervisors  a former employee told Reuters on Friday.

column4: Tesla fired hundreds of employees in past week -Mercury News
column5: Oct 13 Luxury electric vehicle maker Tesla Inc fired between 400 and 700 employees this week  including engineers  managers and factory workers  Mercury News reported on Friday  citing interviews with former and current employees.

column4: Assured Guaranty withdraws PREPA lawsuit in Hurricane Maria aftermath
column5: Oct 13 Bond insurer Assured Guaranty Ltd said on Friday it voluntarily withdrew its lawsuit against Puerto Rico Electric Power Authority (PREPA) over the failure to apply pledged revenue to the payment of bonds because of the utility's need to focus on restoring the power grid damaged by Hurricane Maria.

column4: General Motors reaches tentative deal with striking Canada workers
column5: TORONTO General Motors Co  said on Friday it reached a tentative labor agreement with striking workers at its CAMI plant in Canada  ending an almost month-old dispute.

column4: UPDATE 1-General Motors reaches tentative deal with striking Canada workers
column5: TORONTO  Oct 13 General Motors Co said on Friday it reached a tentative labor agreement with striking workers at its CAMI plant in Canada  ending an almost month-old dispute.

column4: General Motors reaches tentative agreement with striking Canada auto workers
column5: TORONTO  Oct 13 General Motors Co said on Friday it has reached a tentative labour agreement with its striking workers at CAMI plant in Canada though the agreement is subject to member ratification.

column4: India's NSL to pursue intellectual property litigation with Monsanto
column5: NEW DELHI India's Nuziveedu Seeds Ltd (NSL) said on Saturday it will not settle a long-standing intellectual property dispute with Monsanto Co  over genetically modified (GM) cotton  despite some other Indian companies doing so in recent weeks.

column4: India's NSL to pursue intellectual property litigation with Monsanto
column5: NEW DELHI  Oct 14 India's Nuziveedu Seeds Ltd (NSL) said on Saturday it will not settle a long-standing intellectual property dispute with Monsanto Co over genetically modified (GM) cotton  despite some other Indian companies doing so in recent weeks.
